item.description: <p>Her son says there is more to the case than local police say.</p>

item.title: Israel receives remains of two deceased hostages held in Gaza
item.description: <p>The deceased hostages were identified as Amiram Cooper and Sahar Baruch, according to a statement from the Prime Minister&#x27;s Office.</p><p><strong></strong></p>

item.title: From lavish to bizarre: The gifts presented to Donald Trump by foreign leaders
item.description: <p>P﻿rone to flattery and obsessed by gold, the US president hasn&#x27;t been short of receiving extravagant presents during his overseas visits.</p>

item.title: 'Orwellian': US Justice Department strikes mentions of January 6 riots from court papers, removes attorneys
item.description: <p>T﻿he US Justice Department scrubbed mentions of the January 6 riot and Trump&#x27;s social media posts from court documents.</p>

item.title: Queensland Health confirms common food source of six cases of rat bait poisoning
item.description: <p>A sixth case of ﻿rat bait poisoning has been identified in Queensland as authorities say they have now confirmed all cases are linked to a common food source.</p>

item.title: New images of suspects sought over Sydney home invasion
item.description: <p>A﻿ young man was left hospitalised when the armed gang forced their way into a property.</p>

item.title: Man's new Tesla struck by suspected meteorite on remote Aussie highway in 'one-in-trillion' chance encounter
item.description: <p>&quot;One minute we were fine, the next minute we were in absolute chaos.&quot;</p>

item.title: Trial prosecutor 'chickened out' in questioning camper killer Greg Lynn, defence claims
item.description: <p>Lynn, 59, was brought to the Court of Appeal in Melbourne inside a prison van on Friday morning for his much-anticipated challenge of a murder conviction and 32-year sentence.</p>

item.title: Croatia to re-introduce compulsory military service from January next year
item.description: <p>The change is set to come into effect from early next year.</p>

item.title: Buddhist monk taken into custody after being convicted for child sex abuse
item.description: <p>Naotunne Vijitha, 70, was accused of abusing six girls aged between four and 12 inside his living Buddhist temple quarters, a prayer room and at Sunday school.</p>

item.title: Police probe e-bikes involved in fatal head-on that killed eight-year-old boy on Sunshine Coast
item.description: <p>Police are investigating a head-on collision between two e-bikes that caused the death of an eight-year-old boy on the Sunshine Coast yesterday afternoon.</p>

item.title: Nurse banned over intimate relationship with vulnerable mental health patient
item.description: <p>The woman repeatedly insisted the patient was a &quot;very good friend&quot;.</p>

item.title: Boys, 13 and 15, arrested over 'brazen' machete attack caught on camera
item.description: <p>T﻿wo boys are being questioned by police as they search for a third person. </p>

item.title: ANZ dealt $1.1 billion blow after sacking thousands of workers
item.description: <p>ANZ has warned investors to brace for a more than $1.1 billion blow to its bottom line when it releases its half-year updates in a little over a week.</p>

item.title: Driver cracked open drink after car ploughed into family home, witnesses allege
item.description: <p>CCTV vision has captured the moment residents and neighbours tackled a suspected drunk driver to the ground after a car ploughed into a driveway in Melbourne&#x27;s south-east.</p>

item.title: Raiders star Papalii has intimidation court case halted
item.description: <p>Police alleged Papalii was behaving aggressively towards staff after being asked to leave the leagues club in Canberra&#x27;s north during the early hours after a night of drinking.</p>

item.description: <p>F﻿our people remain before the courts after a multi-day operation in the town of Mullumbimby.</p>

item.title: Prince Andrew to lose 'prince' title and move out of the royal lodge, Buckingham Palace confirms

item.title: Rapist former MP jailed after sexually assaulting men
item.description: <p>Former Kiama state MP Gareth Ward was found guilty of sexual intercourse without consent and three indecent assaults in July following a NSW District Court trial.</p>

item.title: Heartbroken dad says late son would be 'stoked' with touching cricket tributes
item.description: <p>Australia&#x27;s top cricketers have taken part in a touching tribute to Ben Austin, the 17-year-old who died following a tragic training mishap in the nets earlier this week.</p>

item.title: BoM backflips on controversial rain radar on new website
item.description: <p>Instead of showing the &quot;rain rate&quot; in millimetres per hour, the radar will now go back to showing &quot;rain reflectivity&quot;, which was what was standard on the old website.</p>

item.title: Accused murderer to stand trial after teen's body found at rubbish tip
item.description: <p>An accused murderer has been committed to stand trial over the death of a woman whose body was later found at a rubbish tip.</p>

item.title: Cheers as historic treaty with First Nations people passes Victorian parliament
item.description: <p>Victoria has become the first state in the nation to legislate a treaty with its Indigenous people.</p>

item.title: 'Deeply devastating': Community mourns five-year-old girl killed in crash outside Sydney primary school
item.description: <p>Floral tributes have been laid outside of a primary school in Sydney&#x27;s north-west after a child was hit by a ute coming out of a driveway yesterday afternoon.</p>

item.title: New 'chill out zone' at Burleigh Heads to keep youth safe
item.description: <p>A new youth checkpoint, similar to those implemented during Schoolies celebrations, has been established in Burleigh Heads.</p>

item.title: Qantas resumes international flights to Adelaide after more than a decade
item.description: <p>Adelaide Airport has marked the resumption of international Qantas flights after more than a decade, with the inaugural Adelaide to Auckland service departing this morning. </p>

item.title: Snowtown killer's parole appeal hearing to be heard in secret
item.description: <p>A date has been set for a hearing on a bid to block the youngest Snowtown serial killer from being released on parole, but it will be shrouded in secrecy.</p>

item.title: Woman arrested after tyres slashed on dozens of cars on southern Gold Coast
item.description: <p>Parked cars between Palm Beach, Currumbin, Kirra, Bilinga and Coolangatta had tyres slashed at some time between 9pm last night and 6am this morning, police have confirmed.</p>

item.title: Severe storm warnings for Ipswich, Lockyer and Sunshine Coast

item.description: <p>No one is bigger than the monarchy. Not even the King&#x27;s brother. In the end, that reality spelled the end of Andrew&#x27;s life as a prince of the realm.</p>
